aboutYourPet: Tell us more about your furry friend
alertNotification: How do you want to receive our notifications?
checkConection: Please verify your connection and try again.
descriptionNotification: With our notifications, you can receive vaccine reminders, valuable health tips and important alerts! Keep your furry friend happy and healthy with the help of Petto.
enterYourPetsWeight: Enter your pet's weight in kilograms
imageOfYourPet: Select an image, try to make it a photo of their face
name: Name
pettoHelpsYourPet: Petto helps ensure your pet is healthy, happy, and well-cared for.
pettoProvidesTips: Petto provides you with useful information about the health, nutrition, and training of your furry friend
pettoRemindsYou: Petto reminds you of the veterinarian, vaccinations, and important events for your furry friend
termsAndCondition: Terms and Conditions of Use for Petto
termsAndConditionAcceptationOne: 1.1 By using the Petto mobile application ("the Application"), you agree and commit to comply with the following terms and conditions of use. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use the application.
termsAndConditionCancelationOne: 9.1 Petto may cancel or suspend your account for a violation of these terms.
termsAndConditionCancelationTwo: 9.2 You have the right to close your account at any time.
termsAndConditionDisputeOne: 10.1 These terms are governed by the laws of [country], and any dispute will be resolved through arbitration in accordance with the rules of [arbitration institution].
termsAndConditionInformationOne: For any questions or concerns related to these terms, contact us at [contact email].
termsAndConditionLimitationOne: 11.1 The Petto application is not intended to replace professional veterinary care. The provided advice is general and should not be considered specific medical advice for your pet. Always consult with a veterinarian for personalized guidance.
termsAndConditionModificationsOne: 8.1 Petto reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications will become effective after being published in the application.
termsAndConditionModificationsTwo: 8.2 Significant changes to the terms will be notified.
termsAndConditionNotificationsOne: 7.1 By registering, you agree to receive notifications and communications from Petto.
termsAndConditionNotificationsTwo: 7.2 You can opt-out of certain types of communications according to notification preferences in the application.
termsAndConditionPrivacyOne: 4.1 By using the application, you acknowledge and agree to the collection and use of information as per our Privacy Policy.
termsAndConditionPrivacyTwo: 4.2 Petto implements security measures to protect user information; however, complete security is not guaranteed.
termsAndConditionPropertyOne: 3.1 All content and intellectual property of the application are the exclusive property of Petto. You do not have the right to reproduce, distribute, or use the content in any way without authorization.
termsAndConditionRegisterOne: 2.1 To use certain features of the application, registration and creating a user account are necessary. By doing so, you agree to provide accurate and complete information.
termsAndConditionRegisterTwo: 2.2 You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login information and for all activities that occur under your account.
termsAndConditionResponsibilityOne: 5.1 Petto is not responsible for any direct or indirect damages caused by the use of the application.
termsAndConditionResponsibilityThree: 5.3 The Petto application does not replace the advice of a veterinarian. You should always consult a professional animal health provider for specific guidance on your pet's health.
termsAndConditionResponsibilityTwo: 5.2 Petto does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free availability of the application.
termsAndConditionUserOne: 6.1 You agree to use the application ethically and legally.
termsAndConditionUserTwo: 6.2 Activities that may harm the application or interfere with its operation are prohibited.
textHelpForgotPassword: Enter the email associated with your account and we'll send a message with instruction to reset your password
